name: Elbow and Knee Strikes
description: Master powerful and devastating close-range strikes using elbows and knees.

cards.title: Horizontal Elbow Strike
cards.description: A fast and sharp elbow strike aimed at cutting through an opponent’s defense.
bulletpoints: Keep elbow level with the target for maximum impact
Pivot on the lead foot to generate power
Aim for the temple, jaw, or ribs

cards.title: Straight Knee Strike
cards.description: A powerful knee strike delivered to the opponent’s midsection.
bulletpoints: Thrust the hips forward to drive the knee
Keep the foot flexed to avoid injury
Use the clinch for better control and positioning
